name: Scavenger Fleet
description:
Welcome to your Space Expedition.

With a fleet of scavengers, you embark on a journey through space. However, you only have a limited amount of resources to counter the dangers that await. Manage them wisely and overcome the challenges ahead.

The Dangers ahead
While traveling through the emptiness of space, you may encounter bandits. Before each encounter, you get briefed with a list of their forces. You may then adapt your fleet accordingly by upgrading your ships.

Resources Management
Your resources are limited from the start. However, suppose you lose a ship in battle. You can salvage some of the resources invested into it and install upgrades before the next wave. From some upgrades however you can salvage more parts than from others so strategic planning is key.
